A few people have contacted me regarding the behaviour of certain members of the forums.

Please follow these simple guidelines for using the forums:

- Post to the correct forum for your topic
- Use a sensible subject line that is relevant to your topic
- Please be polite to other members of the forums
- Please try to ensure that your post actually adds something to the discussion. If you're posting for the sole purpose of increasing your post count, please consider taking up another more worthwhile hobby.

Users who disregard these guidelines may find their posts deleted, and persistent offenders may be banned entirely.

Please bear these points in mind and remember that it is you who makes the forums what they are. If we all behave nicely, the forums will be great.
